name: limbus-ci
description: A simple CI solution for testing extremely portable applications.

scripts.prepare: rm -f bin/limbus-ci ; mkdir -p temp ; mkdir -p bin
scripts.build: npm run-script prepare ; npm run-script webpack && npm run-script babel && echo \#\!/usr/bin/env node > temp/header && cat temp/header temp/packed.es5.js > bin/limbus-ci && chmod +x bin/limbus-ci

author: Jesper Oskarsson <jesosk@gmail.com>
